attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More needs to be done about the environment, as if we keep emitting harful gases into the atmosphere the world we live in today will be a very different place. In as soon as a hundred years from now, our planet could be 1-6 degrees warmer and sea levels could have risen, causing flooding to many human settlements. This major issue needs to be tackled as it will effect our children and the world in which they will live in. Join this petition today and help to combat Global warming. Right here, right now.TATD* for a better planet.  
*TATD- Take Action To Day

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
